newsitem.title: UK: AorTech International to list on London's AIM.
newsitem.headline: AorTech International to list on London's AIM.

text.p: AorTech International Plc, a Scottish manufacturer of mechanical heart valves and ancillary products, said on Tuesday it plans to list on London Stock Exchange's Alternative Investment Market (AIM) via a placing.
First dealings in the shares are expected in late February, a company spokesman said. The issue is expected to value the company at 25.0 million stg and to raise 4.0 million stg.
"To date AorTech has been funded by its existing shareholders, all of whom remain committed to the group and are retaining their shareholdings," said executive chairman Gordon Wright.

"Flotation is a significant step forward which will enable us to take full advantage of the progress we have made over the past four and a half years and thereby accelerate the company's growth," he said.
The nominated adviser and broker to the issue will be Bell Lawrie White and Co.
